blocks.name: joiniooico
blocks.content: Disjoint joining an open interval with a closed-below, open-above interval to form a closed-below, open-above interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm joiniooico(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wceq(cin(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), emptycls), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2))))
} = {
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), emptycls), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), emptycls))
  ixxdisj(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, c2, cioo, cico, clt, clt, cle, clt)
  ixxun(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, c2, clt, cle, cioo, cico, cioo, clt, clt, cle, clt)
  df-ico(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrlenlt(c1, cv(hs3))
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrltletr(cv(hs3), c1, c2)
  xrltletr(c0, c1, cv(hs3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)

  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(cioo)
  diff.hs3.c(cico)
  diff.hs3.c(clt)
  diff.hs3.c(cle)
}

blocks.name: ubico
blocks.content: A right-open interval does not contain its right endpoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Apr-2017.)

blocks.name: xeqlelt
blocks.content: Equality in terms of 'less than or equal to', 'less than'. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jul-2017.)

  elin(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2))
  bitr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cioc, c2))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))))
  anbi12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)))

  elioc1(c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  pm4.71rd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)))
  3expia(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)))
  3jca(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))
  xrlelttrd(c0, cv(hs0), c1, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))))

  simp32(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))
  simp33(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

blocks.name: xrdifh
blocks.content: Class difference of a half-open interval in the extended reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrdifh(class c0) {

  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))

  3bitr4rd(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf))), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))), wo(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)))))
  biortn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))))
  syl6bbr(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))), wo(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wo(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))))), wn(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))))
  notnotd(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))
  pnfge(cv(hs0))
  biorf(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))))
  orcom(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf))), wo(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))))))
  3bitri(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf))), wo(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wo(wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)))), wn(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))), w3o(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))))
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  elicc1(c0, cpnf, cv(hs0))
  3ianor(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf))
  3orass(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cpnf)))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cxr))

  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cmnf, cico, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))))
  3anass(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cmnf, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c0))

blocks.name: iocinif
blocks.content: Relate intersection of two open-below, closed-above intervals with the same upper bound with a conditional construct. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocinif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), cif(co(c1, cioc, c2), co(c0, cioc, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), cif(co(c1, cioc, c2), co(c0, cioc, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wo(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c1, cioc, c2))), wa(wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c2)))))

  exmid(wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  orim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c1, cioc, c2))), wa(wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c2))))
  ancld(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c1, cioc, c2)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c1, cioc, c2)))
  syldan(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c1, cioc, c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3adantl3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  xrltle(c0, c1)
  iocinioc2(c0, c1, c2)
  ancld(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c2)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c2)))
  syldan(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c2), co(c1, cioc, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  syl21anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
